name: Jason Gordon
coverLetter: My name is Jason I am 34 years old and have worked in the MJ industry since 2011. I have multiple harvests and grows that I have been apart of. I have worked for multiple dispensaries and currently broker. I am looking for seasonal and or full time work. I can assist in gardening labor, harvest and trim labor. I currently have a truck camper that I wish to park on the property and live in . I am able to travel immediately. College educated, adaptable and experienced in communal living environments and respectful to all my team mates coworkers.
